text: A Star is Born is a 1954 musical movie starring James Mason and Judy Garland. It was directed by George Cukor. In 2000, the movie was selected for preservation in the United States National Film Registry by the Library of Congress as being "culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant." Lady Gaga and Bradley Cooper starred in the 2018 remake movie. title: A Star Is Born
